p: Board? of Conviction Territory of Washington In Justice Court vs before Mary Ann ONeil Deft Justice of the Peace N.W.M. Branch?
Action for the Crime of Vagrancy

Mary Ann Oneil having been duly convicted of the crime of vagrancy and ordered to give bonds in the sum of or dollars for her good behavior and to pay the court in the jail taxed at 5.75 dollars. And having failed to do either, now on said 4th day of to the County Jail for the 33. days or until such bond is filed and and said court
Given under my hand this 4th day of Aug 1886
D. M. - Justice of the Peace.
